title: 10 Spiritual Little Nuggets On Business
description: This book was holy spirit inspired by God. This book is a key importance on how to apply God's word in starting or your existing business. This is a quick read and a go to manual to help you navigate in your business ventures. This book give 10 little nuggets with scripture to help you succeed in doing business. I pray this book will bless your life and business.
author: Irene Jones
